sentences.sContent: It was built for one of the Henderson family, right?
sentences.sContent_eng: It was built for one of the Henderson family, right?
sentences.sCn: 它是为了亨德森家族的一个成员建的，对吧？

sentences.sContent: Come to the Henderson Language School and change your life.
sentences.sContent_eng: Come to the Henderson Language School and change your life.
sentences.sCn: 来到亨德森语言学校，就会改变你的一生。

sentences.sContent: In 1950, roughly one in 20 men of prime working age, like Henderson, was not working; today that ratio is about one in five, the highest ever recorded.
sentences.sContent_eng: In 1950, roughly one in 20 men of prime working age, like Henderson, was not working; today that ratio is about one in five, the highest ever recorded.
sentences.sCn: 1950年，大约每20名处于适龄工作年龄的男人中，就有一名像亨德森这样没有工作的；现在这一比例约为五分之一，是历史最高纪录。
